Package it.polimi.ingsw.playerBoard

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.playerBoard.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceLocation, Scoring, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResourceLocation, Scoring, java.lang.Cloneable
Board represents the board of each player It is a container of the classes which represents board's elements

      public boolean containsResources​(ConcreteResourceSet concreteResourceSet) throws InvalidResourceSetException

      Specified by:
      containsResources in interface ResourceLocation
      Parameters:
      concreteResourceSet - The ConcreteResourceSet to check
      Returns:
      True iff this Board contains concreteResourceSet
      Throws:
      InvalidResourceSetException - concreteResourceSet is null

    • addResourcesToWarehouse

      public void addResourcesToWarehouse​(int depotIndex, ConcreteResourceSet concreteResourceSet) throws InvalidResourceSetException, InvalidDepotIndexException, InvalidResourceLocationOperationException
      addResourcesToWarehouse adds resources to a given depot
      Parameters:
      depotIndex - The index of the Depot to add resources into
      concreteResourceSet - The ConcreteResourceSet to add
      Throws:
      InvalidResourceSetException - concreteResourceSet is null
      InvalidDepotIndexException - There is no depot corresponding to depotIndex
      InvalidResourceLocationOperationException - concreteResourceSet cannot be added to the given depot

    • removeResourcesFromWarehouse

      public void removeResourcesFromWarehouse​(int depotIndex, ConcreteResourceSet concreteResourceSet) throws InvalidResourceSetException, InvalidDepotIndexException, InvalidResourceLocationOperationException
      removeResourcesFromWarehouse removes resources from a given depot
      Parameters:
      depotIndex - The index of the Depot to remove resources from
      concreteResourceSet - The ConcreteResourceSet to remove
      Throws:
      InvalidResourceSetException - concreteResourceSet is null
      InvalidDepotIndexException - There is no depot corresponding to depotIndex
      InvalidResourceLocationOperationException - concreteResourceSet cannot be removed from the given depot

    • removeResourcesFromStrongbox

      public void removeResourcesFromStrongbox​(ConcreteResourceSet concreteResourceSet) throws InvalidResourceSetException, InvalidResourceLocationOperationException
      Removes resources from Strongbox
      Parameters:
      concreteResourceSet - The set of Resources to be removed.
      Throws:
      InvalidResourceSetException - concreteResourceSet is null
      InvalidResourceLocationOperationException - The strongbox doesn't contain the resourceSet to be removed.
